metadata.title: CVE-2023-34057 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: VMware Tools contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability. Amalicious actor with local user access to a guest virtual machine mayelevate privileges within the virtual machine.

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
